definition: to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: There was a recent photo of his parents along with the letter.
sentences.chinese: 信中还附着一张他父母的近照。

sentences.english: Product is only applicable to white paint system to reduce the color of floating and improve adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 产品只适用于白漆体系，减少颜色上浮，提高附着力。

sentences.english: Attached to provide superior layer of the substrate and enhance paint adhesion.
sentences.chinese: 提供优越的附载层，提高面涂与基材的附着力。

sentences.english: This paint will adhere to any surface, whether rough or smooth.
sentences.chinese: 这种油漆能附着于任何粗糙或光滑的表面。

sentences.english: The bacteria attached to the surface of harpactecoid copepods were mainly vibrios.
sentences.chinese: 挠足类动物表面的附着细菌主要是弧菌。

sentences.english: Attached Colliders' objects must intersect with the cloth you are attaching to.
sentences.chinese: 注意，被附着的碰撞体必须与布料有相交。

sentences.english: Shellfish usually attach themselves to rocks.
sentences.chinese: 贝类通常附着于岩石上。

sentences.english: The replicas are made by using a thin film of fusible alloy on a stiffening platen .
sentences.chinese: 复制是用附着在加强托板上的可熔合金薄膜实现的。

sentences.english: 36Those who had seen it told the people how the demon-possessed man had been cured.
sentences.chinese: 看见这事的便将被鬼附着的人怎么得救告诉他们。

sentences.english: The sperm contacts with vitelline membrane by its radial arms of the nucleus, and undergoes acrosome reaction immediately.
sentences.chinese: 精子以其核突起附着在卵膜上，并迅速发生顶体反应。

sentences.english: The academic honor plot nightmare which creates by the imperial civil service examination adheres to stickcohere equally likely on their body.
sentences.chinese: 由科举造成的功名情节像梦魇一样附着在他们身上。

sentences.english: It attaches to people's brains, and sucks away their lives.
sentences.chinese: 它附着在人的大脑，并且榨干人的生命。

sentences.english: Don't man-handle the package. Most bugs love the top of a package.
sentences.chinese: 不要人工搬运包袋，虫子多喜爱附着在袋中上游部分。

sentences.english: The compatibility between tenocyte and terylene was poor.
sentences.chinese: 腱细胞与涤纶的相容性较差，在几丁质上无细胞附着。

sentences.english: The closer the adaptation between these substances, the higher the forces of adhesion will be.
sentences.chinese: 二者之间的密合性越好，附着力就越大。

sentences.english: The portion of the follicle between the sebaceous duct and the insertion of the arrector pili muscle is the isthmus.
sentences.chinese: 毛囊皮脂腺导管开口至立毛肌附着处为峡部。

definition: to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
to clear away/to eliminate/to get rid of
to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
